content.detailedDescription: This morning my partner woke me up around 6:30 all excited and out of sorts (but mostly excited).  she said she thought she saw something.  i was having difficulty waking up fully.  i was in a very deep sleep.  anyway...Here's what happened.  she was sitting at her computer this morning.   it was still very dark, just a little before 6:30. out of the corner of her eye she saw a light outside my window where my desk is sitting.  at the same time she noticed the light she also became aware of a deep humming noise.  kathy said she could actually feel the hum in her belly.  what she saw out the window was a light (not a flash) that was as bright as lightening lighting up the area of sky below what looked to be some sort of aircraft.  the light was not a narrow beam of light straight down but more like a reverse funnel, the widest end facing earth.  the craft itself was not very far away, probably not even a mile.  the craft was more glowing than lit.  she didn't see any lights on the craft just the craft itself glowing.  i asked her if she could describe the size and all she could say was if she had wrapped her finger around it while she saw it from where she was sitting, it would be about 2 inches.  it wasn't very high in the sky.  the lights turned off once and the humming stopped at the same time.  she could still see the craft glowing once the light coming below the craft had been distinguished.  then they came back on within a couple seconds with the same low humming.  the craft had not moved at all.  this last time (the 2nd time) that the light disappeared, the craft vanished as well.  and i slept thru the whole thing....Bummer!!!  who knows...Maybe i was in the aircraft and i was being returned when the whole visitation took place.  kathy said it probably took all of 5 seconds for the entire visitation to transpire.  she has no doubt that it was a ufo.
content.summary: Deep low hum and bright beaming light from bottom of craft. craft never moved and then vanished into thin air.  took about 5 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: On sept.18th 2009,looking towards the west(i live near the la brea tar pits in los angeles,i saw what looked like a hang glider with a morning star next to it.The objects where very high in the sky.As i continued to observe them, the v-shaped object straightened out.It was like a line of light,then changed to a c-shaped,then back to a v shape,then straight,then c-shaped.It keep repeating this pattern.The star or light next to it became brighter.This was as i was standing in front of my apt.Building.I continued on to the la brea(5 min.S away by car) tar pits where i take my dog in the morning.I pointed it out to some other people at the park.There remarks where,"that i have really good eyes" to have spotted the objects. as i looked a little south of the objects, three more bright lights(looked like stars) appeared.These were over the variety building on wilshire blvd. if ur familar with the area,but very high in the sky.2 more light appeared with the v shaped object.Between 8:30& 9 am.Shortly after 9am,the lights and object disappeared.
content.summary: V-shaped object that changed shaped to a straight line with star like lights near it.Almost as if they were being signaled by the v-shaped object

content.detailedDescription: On 10/8/2009 atlanta ga, walton county, my girlfriend and i were driving down hwy 78 east towards monroe ga when i noticed a large light in the sky. at first i did not say anything to her as i thought it was just a helicopter with a spot light on, but it seemed much bigger, almost like a large bright star. as we got futher down hwy 78 i asked her what that was, she thought it was a tower light, but the tower was almost beside us and was flashing red. at this point the object was not moving, but you could tell from the size of the lights it was big.. i thought it must be a large cargo plane moving slowly and low, but this was not moving and was to big for that..I looked at the time it was 9:15pm. as we got closer i could see that there was 4 lights and that they were white and very large in size. we pulled over on the shoulder by a local church driveway and i just stared at these lights. then, i seen a small red light about what seemed to be maybe 2 football fields infront of this object were just floating there, it was weird cause the red dot was like dead in front of it, she said it was almost like it was pulling the large object.. i pulled off back on to the highway and made a u turn into the between gas station, at this point i put our windows down and all you could hear was a deep humming, not like a jet or a plane, more like a electric current, we could see up under this massive craft, she descibed it as boomerange shaped and that the lights were split, like 2 on one side and two on the other, with a gap in the middle, same is what i seen as well.. there is no way a plane of that size could just sit there that heavy and without falling to the ground.. at that point it seemed as if the object was moving pointing more towards the west, i got on hwy 78 west, my girlfriend now had her window to the craft.. we were basically under it but it was a little off to her right, she said to me to hurry up it was moving slow but turning and the trees were in the way of seeing it.. this craft was low.. as i got on 78 i seen the red dot in front of the craft split into another round dot that was blue, and the red dot was already small enough. so, at this point there were a red and blue dot infont of the craft and all 4 lights still on. we were on the hwy but going very slow, at once all 4 lights went out and the 2 small lights were gone as well.. i got speed up to 65mph on 78 west up the road and pulled over on a hill, this would have got me in the direction it was going, as i pulled over, i got out of my truck and cut it off, i did not see or hear anyting.. i stood around for about 5 min and nothing... i have no idea what this was.. to be that massive of a craft and to be so low and i dont know how it keeping itself up.. when it vanished, it did not power up or flash away, it just went invisible..
content.summary: Bright light in sky above trees, not moving almost like a helicopter spot light but much bigger and brighter..

content.detailedDescription:
A colleague and myself had just arrived at the local pub after work and had sat down in the garden at the back. it was a perfectly clear night and we had not yet begun drinking! my friend pointed to the sky and said 'hey, what's that'. we both observed a bright, orange/gold light heading towards us from the north. the object was brighter than a star, had no other lights as a plane would and moved quickly and silently towards us. the light appeared to have some movement in it, almost as though it was rotating. bearing in mind that it was a very clear, very still night with no wind, the light passed overhead and appeared to be moving not only south but also straight up. as it faded, it's flashing became more apparent - being visible for a second, then invisible for a second, regularly repeating. this flashing was only just perceivable as it approached as the light was brighter. definitely not a plane, helicopter or satellite etc. it traversed the whole visible sky in a smooth arc in just 20 second or so and then was gone. once again, it was completely silent. we both discussed it for some time and could find no prosaic explanation for the object or its movement.

also worth mentioning perhaps is that for several hours after the sighting, my mobile phone (iphone) had no signal whatsoever and told me my carrier was no longer available. i usually get full signal in this area. the signal returned to full about 3 hours after the sighting.
content.summary: Golden light, appeared to be rotating, passed overhead silently and quickly.

content.detailedDescription: Thee diamond shaped craft flying in very close formation traveling from south towards the north. on my birthday, i received a pair of binoculars and would spend about a half hour per night viewing the night sky in my back yard. having heard the clearest way to view stars in a bright city is to look straight up. i was viewing night sky on the day of the incident for about 10-15 minutes when three diamond shaped craft flew in my viewing field. there were no lights emanating from craft and the objects were much darker than the sky around allowing one to see the shape of the craft. objects flew in very tight formation with no noticeable deviation in flight path nor deviation in flight formation. each object clearly outlined due to  contrast between the objects and the sky and stars could be clearly seen between the objects. the sighting took only a handful of seconds and the objects appeared to be, in my estimation, 3500-5000 feet in altitude and traveling about 200-250 mph. since binoculars have a small field of view, objects were easily lost never to again to be seen. highly excited, ran inside to tell family member.
content.summary: Three diamond shaped craft with no lights over los angeles.

content.detailedDescription: Taking photos of the moon. when object appered overhead. it was there then it was gone.
content.summary: Disk shaped object over head

content.detailedDescription:
Massachusetts ufo encounter

    the witnesses were a female named shirley (real name) in her mid 30���s and her son who was between 8 and 9 years old at the time. i���ve talked with the mother on several occasions and found her to be coherent, intelligent, and very clear about the facts after repeated questioning. 
   the event took place on a clear, cold spring morning in 1984 or ���85. they had gotten up early at the request of the son to watch the space shuttle fly by. the 80-year home is located in westborough mass. the house was a 2- story with 3 rooms on each floor. a triangular craft about the same diameter as the house was seen passing about 2 car lengths above her house. her son is positive that the craft had 7 lights in a v formation with one at the top and 3 on each side forming the v formation. she said that the lights were red in color and about the size of a baseball and they didn���t blink. it continued to move very slowly across the top of her house. at one point she felt that the craft stopped for several minutes above her home to observe them, then moved on. the craft took between 10-15 minutes to pass over and it passed so slowly that it was boring for the mother to watch. 
    shirley didn���t experienced any missing time although she would consider under going hypnosis to see if there are any lost memories. she said the streetlight was on, possibly blocking out the edges of the craft and she felt this is why she only saw the lights. shirley also felt had the craft been higher up it would have been very difficult to see. she did think of taking pictures but her son who realized the craft was not the space shuttle became very afraid of it and because of his fright she wasn���t able to leave him alone to get her camera. however the son described the craft as being black against a black sky. he could see it had a definite form and edges to it because it blocked out the stars.
content.summary: One trinagle with 7 red lights

content.description: 2 uavs hovered elevated in front of witness's car at railroad tracks on bangs avenue.
content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down tully rd from kiernan to bangs when i noticed two blue lights in the distance moving in sporadic patterns. the light on the right was more active at this time. i took three photos. after the second photo the lights stopped in midair. i drove to the stop sign and turned left on bangs headed east. my hope was to get a closer look and a better photo. i gauged the distance to be past mchenry blvd to the east but when i got to the train tracks just before mchenry my vehicle was converged on from the fields from the north and the south (just before the autodealership on my right). i could see them from my front window approximately thirty to fifty feet with one being above the other. my two year old began to cry and my six year old said "daddy, i'm afraid." i continued to the stop light and made a right. i traveled for almost two blocks through pelandale when my daughter said "daddy, it is following us." i told her to pray and not to worry. as we approached the next light there was construction going on. (many workers repaving the road and a police car) i asked her if she still saw it and she said yes. by the time we reached standiford she said that it went away. i did not get a close look but would guess that it was not much larger than a vehicle. my daughter told me that she saw a window at the top with light coming out of it but she could not see anyone inside of the object.

the light to the right is from a barn or house. you can see the difference is clearly in the type of lighting and how the camera picks up the illumination from it. i have been told already that it was venus or mars, but i received an award in high school for astronomy having received straight a's in the course and i know this was not a star. i checked with the central valley citizen's for liberty and a member told me that he saw the blue lights where he lives in south modesto. his thought was that perhaps the modesto pd had obtained a drone craft like ripon has done. i am not certain that is the 




case as whatever this was did not give off any sound.
content.summary: Blue lights in the night

content.detailedDescription: I was in the kitchen by the sink looking out the window at about 2 a.M and saw a bright light in the sky above madeline island in lake superior.At first i thought it might be a airplane but i wasnt sure because it wasn't moving. it was bright white at this time. i watched it for a few minutes and it started changing colors from white, yellow,blue,red, and green.The lights were changing really fast. and the light was staying in the same place the whole time. i woke up my girlfriend to show her and she saw it to. i pulled out binoculars to look at it and it looked like a big bright ball changing colors rapidly. you could really make out the colors. so i watched it for about an hour and it didn't move and was still changing colors. i dont know what it was, but it was still in the same spot and changing colors in the sky when i decided to go to bed.
content.summary: Lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was at my local hobby shop in wilmington nc,we race rc cars every wensday night,we took a 5 minute break i went outside to smoke,it was dark some clouds in the sky,i looked up at a angel and saw something moving i thought it was clouds uncovering stars,but no i looked to my right and up and saw a object moving,i did not know what it was.The object i saw was aprox,150 yards from corner to corner,i saw three lights one on each end point,lights were all one color,like a star there was no sound that i could here,it was moving around 15 to 25 mph it was as if it was full of helium so quiet,my feelings were did i just see a ufo i told myself no but i knew what i saw was no plane or flying machine i have ever seen,i wanted to tell someone when i saw it but thought they would just laugh and say sure you did.After the sighting i thought about it the rest of the night,trying to convence myself i didn't see a ufo,i still don't know what i saw but what ever it was it amazed me.I lost sight of it after it went into cloud cover.People will think i lost my mind if i tell this to anyone.
content.summary: My first ufo sighting was last night

content.detailedDescription:
We dropped dad off at the airport (stewart) really early in the morning on the 10th or 11th september. on our way home it was still dark. we drove north on ny thruway 87 and i looked out my front passenger window and saw a really bright star in the skye. in a second the star moved really close, got a little bigger and brighter and i said to my mom "what's that!?!!"
mom: i was driving and when my daughter yelled out i looked where she was pointing in the sky. in the moments i glanced away from the road i saw a bright light quite close, about 2000ft high- below cloud level, basketball sized at arms length. the amazing thing was that it was changing as we looked at it. although it started out as a bright star-like object, it became surrounded by a dark-greyish mist or smoke and within, the single white light became a group of lights that flashed in series around an oval shape- the lights flashed around this oval object at least 2 times- i kept glancing back at the road as i slowed down. the mist around it began to dissipate and at the same time the object changed shape again from oval to triangular, but a strange triangle that was very dark with slightly swept back wings. the light configuraton changed at the same time to two large bright lights underneath and slightly back from the tip of the triangle shape- like two bug eyes close together. the mist was almost completely gone now. the object rotated so those lights faced us (west) and then suddenly a small light on the end of each wing appeared and began to blink alternately- one reddish, one white. so fast, so amazing was this transformation. i finally pulled over to watch and the object just seemed to 'float' in a westward direction toward pennsylvania over the thruway and behind a hill and trees. didn't hear any noise, no sudden bursts of speed, but it disappeared rather quickly- i glanced away for a moment to put the car in park and it was gone. on the way home i tried to figure out what it could have been- such as a plane making its approach for landing, maybe we saw various orientations as it dropped lower and lined up with the airport runway- but i've seen hundreds of planes, day and night and it didn't make sense with all the mist and light changes. my husband was a pilot and expert on aircraft through the vietnam war. has anyone else seen similar morphing objects recently in the area?  
when i first saw the object i said- "wow! , that's a ufo!"- but i became unsure of what i saw on the drive home.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Chevron,   Disc,   Oval,   Star-like,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: At mile marker 66 of the ny state thruway 87 my mom and i saw a bright light that morphed into an object with blinking lights then changed again.

content.detailedDescription: At around ten pm my wife looked out a door towards her mothers house which she does every night when we get ready for bed.She told me their was some lights in the sky.I looked out their was a red and green flashing light so i got my binoculars and went outside,this object was to the north it then droped about a foots distance in the sky.As i watched a simular object apeared to the right,the red light was on the lower right hand side and the blue green was on the upper left side.I watched these for approximately,five minutes they never moved there was no sound then they droped behind the mountains.We watched simular objects in the summer of 08 they would appear at different places in the sky.
content.summary: Two sets of red and green flashing lights with white background

content.detailedDescription:
Alright.. hands down i have possibly the best daytime u.F.O pictures in the world right now. the pictures were taken with a 1.3 mega pxl lg camera phone. i sent the pictures to e-mail then enhanced the three pictures on photo paper the size of a 22 inch flat screen t.V. they are breath taking to look at and i feel they are worth alot of money. i consider myself a ufologist. when i see all the folklure and fake images it really really irritates me because people can be so ignorant. it's been said by a million people that we are not alone. my three pictures even show movement, the tree line, clouds, the sun, and i zoomed in on one shot which shows deapth perception. the orb huvered underneath the sun on a tilt resembles a fire bright yellow orange color that was almost as bright as the sun. when i took these pictures the camera picked up a redish ora pulsating off this e.V.T.That the naked eye could not see. to whom this may concern feel free to contact me because i would love for someone to try and debunk my siting.I am currently in scottsdale arizona for the next three weeks. once again i would like to sell my only copies for a reasonable price. they are just astonishing to look at.The pictures are not yet certified waterloo or whatever you call it.   

i was in a field playing soccer. i walked from the soccer feild through to another feild on my way to a friends and saw what i thought was a bright reflection of something. it stayed huvering on a tilt about 200 feet off the ground. i got goose bumps, chills, i was wishing there were people around to see this phenomena. i am allways taking pictures of things with my phone so i pulled it out immediatly hit the button on the side of the phone that turns on the camera, i had like 2 or 3 minutes to take three pictures one on zoom. the ufo pulsated and moved under the sun now looking like an firey oval shape huvering horizontal. it became blinding to look at considering it was blending right into the sun. next was the disapearance into the sun. the pictures also tell a story.
content.summary: I have the most amazing day time photos.I've seen similar e.V.Ts

content.detailedDescription:
From 7am to 7:45am this morning (8/10/09) there were unusual lights over connor pass, co. kerry ireland. from our bedroom window, myself and my husband witnessed this. it appeared to be a triangular shaped craft, hovering over the lake area perhaps. we saw this from the dingle side of connor pass. the crafted shifted east and west several times and then ascended into cloud cover.
 
the photo was taken with a small digital camera, no zoom.  but if you zoom in you can see a small orb like object just over the top of the mountain.  with the naked eye this object was much brighter than it appears in the photo.  viewing with binoculars, we could clearly make out a  triangle shape.  i rang shannon air traffic control and they didn't know of any craft in the area at that hour nor was there any mountain rescue helicopters out then.
 
i don't know what it was, but it wasn't a weather balloon, a plane, a star, a helicopter, or a ball of gas,  through the binoculars there were many lights outlining a triangle shape.
 
there was also a higher dimmer light, that might have been a star.  or, it could have been another craft higher up, but it was stationary.  both disappeared behind cloud cover as the morning brightened.  about the time the morning flights from america to shannon airport pass over, the craft was gone.
  
we have never seen anything like this in our lives.  we are in our 50s.
content.summary: Triangle shaped caft hovering over mountain for about 45 min. in the early morning

content.detailedDescription:
I clean a small office on the nw corner of lilly road and capitol drive.
i was working with my son. stepped out to the truck to get some furniture polish.  out of the corner of my eye i saw three lights that looked like lights on a tv broadcast antenna.  i got the polish and was thinking "i don't remember there being an antenna there in the middle of a residential area.  so i looked again and noticed the lights were moving slowly. (looking east-north east.  i looked to see if there were blinking lights which would identify the lights as an airplane or helicopter.  no blinking lights - just bright glowing orange kind of light.  i went inside the office and called my 19 year old son out.  by that time the lights were descending and disappeared behind the tree line. we thought they were gone but we could see the lights close to the ground through spaces in the trees.  then the three lights started to rise.  my son had his little video camera in the truck and he started recording the movements of the lights.  he didn't have a tri-pod so it was hard to stay on target.  but you can see that these lights were definitely not planes or a helicopter.  they made no noise.  the three lights may have been part of a triangular shaped object but we couldn't see any structure between the lights.  i will try to attach the video. the next week we went to the cleaning job early while there was daylight.  the area about a half a mile in the direction we saw the lights is a large highschool yard right next to some low wet lands.  it looked to be about 100 feet lower than the location where we had observed the lights.  this would explain how the lights would look like they were almost at ground level behind the trees but if they were over the swampy area they would have been as much as a 100 ft. in the air.

we watched the objects until they suddenly disappeared. there is a bright gas station across the street that didn't affect the visibility of the objects.  also the noise is because its a very busy highway.  it was traffic noise not the objects.  i have since watched planes fly over that area and you could hear them.  these craft made no noise whatsoever.

the attached media can be opened in windows media player.
content.summary: Saw three bright orange lights in sky that moved in relation to each other.

content.detailedDescription:
i was taking a photo of the nice sunset from my backyard. i noticed the three circular lights and said; mom look at those beautiful three lights. i didn't relate it to being ufo's that evening. i said, that represents the holy trinity or three angels. mom answered; no, those represent the three children you are going to have. at the time i was pregnant which weeks later resulted in a miscarriage. :( 
    i didnt' notice the perfect circular figure untill tonight when i zoomed in on the photo. that's when i said oh wow!!!! i think i caught three ufo's in this picture. my heart started pumping and i felt chills all over. but when i look at this photo i get a sense of peace, i set this photo as my wallpaper on my cell phone, because i love those three lights with the sunset. it definitely has a meaning. the objects remained in that same spot untill the sunset. i haven't seen them again. i do hope they come back. 
     has anyone taking photos like these of seen anything like here in colorado? i'd love to know.
content.summary: Three circular lights in the castle rock sunset

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting on my front porch talking on the phone with a friend from back east. it was late in the evening; quarter past 11 or so when i looked up in the sky and as soon as i did, i saw a damn ufo. i knew exactly what it was when i saw it. it was blackish/greyish with...Some kind of cloaking devic. it resembled the camo of the alien in the movie predator. it was moving very fast and in a straight line. i lost sight of the ufo in a couple of seconds. i was traveling westbound in a straight line. i know it was relatively close to the ground because because of its size. i did not hear anything though or see any lights of any kind. when i saw it, i knew exavtly what it was and a sence of pure honor/luckieness came over me. i never doubted it for a second that it was not a ufo.It was unmistakeable! i told the person on the phone what i saw and she thought i was nuts. it sounds nuts, i know. i hope to see something like that again in my lifetime, but probably won't. it was such a blessing to see.                           thank you
content.summary: Blackish/grayish triangular object/ looked like there was some kind of cloaking enabled- kind of like the movie predator

content.detailedDescription: I live by orofino idaho,about 21 miles from the dwarshack dam.On the night of 911 my husband and i were in our hot tub,we live right on the river,clearwater river,and we saw two big red circular objects up in the sky.I called 911 and said that i thought that no airplanes were supposed to be flying except military,i said that i saw two red circles and then they dissapeard,they hung up on me.Well it was a clear night and i know what i saw!I was looking at the sky as i often do,then the two objects just came from the north and stayed at the westerly position for about 10 to 15 minutes then they looked like they went off to the east were dwarshack dam is and just dissapeard.Jill
content.summary: There were two and they were red

content.detailedDescription: i live in north naples fl. very near wiggins pass on the southwest coast. on the early morning of september 20th,2009 at approximatly 1:30am my husband and i was taking a late night swim in our pool. the night was clear and we had been watching stars. i noticed a glowing v shape light moving south along the coast it surprised me so i told my husband to look. the light was a glow and in the shape of a boomerang or wide v shape nothing was flashing or changing, just a steady glow. we watched and followed it as far as we could see. there was no noise with it and it moved faster then any small plane. my husband and i are both pilots so we often watch plane traffic. when i first saw it i thought it could be a light reflecting from traffic but when we followed it we realized it had the v shape form.  it caught us off guard but we were able to watch it for about 10 seconds until obstacles got in the way. wow!
content.summary: Sighted a glowing boomerang shape moving silently along the coast.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside when i saw a glowing light in the sky very low to the ground and was very excited because i've seen the same ufo a few weeks before...I got my camera and recorded a video,it disappeared a few times but glowed a lot,and then suddenly disappeared.
content.summary: Saw seen ufo i've seen before

content.detailedDescription:
while fishing at night on a pay per person boat out of the fort myers beach area the boat was circled by a glowing light. the captain was positioning the boat over a fishing spot, he had dropped the anchor and backed the boat over the spot. 
   just as he rang the bell to signal everyone to drop their lines down, the mate on the back of the boat who was there to help us untangle lines and tie on new hooks, etc, pointed up and said "look, a ufo."  
   thinking he was joking i looked up and saw a glowing ball of light coming down the left side of the boat from the front. it continues past the boat, after it was maybe 100 yards away it turned left, went across the back of the boat, made a left turn and went up the right side of the boat.
 as it went up the right side of the boat it gained altitude, then accelerated rapidly up at a slight angle and went out of sight.  it made no sound at all. i looked back at the mate, said "that was a ufo." 
   he said, "we see them out here all the time."
   he was not  excited at all, he went back to work helping take fish off lines as the fishermen caught them. it made me believe he probably did see a lot of them, he never mentioned it again. it didn't seem to be a big deal to him at all.
   the ball of light we saw was not very big. it was hard to tell exactly how far it was from the boat but i'd guess it was 100 to 150 yards away and about the size of a beach ball. it made a straight pass down one side of the boat, turned 90 degrees to the left , made a straight pass across the stern, turned 90 degrees to the left again and went in a straight line up the right side, except as it went up the right side of the boat it gained altitude and accelerated. 
   it was not exceptionally bright, i would think if it had been during the day we might not have seen it at all. the night was very dark, perfectly clear but with no moon. the object seemed to be under control since it stayed the same distance from the boat all the time. it was like the object was looking the boat over.
   i am not certain of the exact date this event happened but if necessary i could check with friends who were on the boat with me. they were visiting from out of state, would probably be able to help me pin down the date and time very closely.
   i have been in touch with morgan beall from mufon in fort myers, florida. he suggested i make this report. i'll be happy in any way i can to help him investigate this.
content.summary: A small light, maybe 2 feet across circled a fishing boat.

content.detailedDescription:
On october 6th in centennial, co at about 3:00pm i was sitting in my car facing west at the school bus stop where my grandson would be dropped off to be driven back to our house.  before the bus arrived,  i was looking through the front windshield and suddenly noticed an odd v-shaped object moving slowly across the sky going north.  there was no sound, and the v shape was moving in the direction of the open end on its side like this < not in the pointed direction as one might imagine. this seemed to be metallic looking and possibly glinting in the afternoon sunlight, although the ���glint��� changed position to different locations along the 2 lines forming the <. no windows and no apparent lights from the craft.
after about a minute, i was still watching when it instantly disappeared and could not be seen again. i could not relocate the object in view even after intense scrutiny of the area in front of the path of motion. it just seemed to disappear into thin air.
so the two strangest aspects of this were the object moving in the open v direction, and the fact that it disappeared instantly from view after a full minute of observation.
i���ve seen many aircraft in my lifetime, but never anything like this, because it just seemed to come into view suddenly and then disappear suddenly without a trace.
content.summary: <  shaped - metallic looking traveling in the direction of the open < shape.

content.detailedDescription:
O que realmente me deixou curioso foi a luz que o objeto emite por exemplo as plantas s���o iluminadas pelo objeto.

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=etvq25znuvw
content.summary: Uma luz estranha

content.detailedDescription: My roommate woke me up around 2am telling me there was something strange in the sky and that it might be a ufo. i got up and went out on our east facing lanai. almost directly east there was a very abnormally bright light in the sky, which could have past for a very bright star or planet. every few seconds though, the light would grow brighter, or change colors, ranging from white, silver, to a more bluish color. the object never moved in any direction or differed in its actions. around 3am an airplane took off from honolulu international airport and flew eastward south of the object.
content.summary: Bright flashing stationary objest high in the sky over diamondhead

content.detailedDescription:
As we were traveling on 10 hiway coming east out of lawrence, ks about noon on sunday, oct. 4, 2009, we sighted two objects moving e/ne over eudora, ks. just after sighting, the object on the right veered se and disappeared while the object to the left continued traveling ne. at desoto we exited 10 hiway and began driving side roads in an effort to keep tracking the object. we tracked it all the way to the kansas river and then lost it as it appeared to descend over the hilly woods just sw of bonner springs about 12:22pm.
the objects appeared retangular and grey-colored,and, and since they were moving away from us, we felt we were looking at the rectangular rear-ends of the objects. we cannot say for sure what the entire shape of the objects would have been, but both of them also had what appreared to be two circular "engines?" or "ports?" with a connecting silvery stripe between them on the rectangular rear-ends visible to us. 
as far as we could tell, they flew totally silently.
content.summary: Two rectangular objects heading ne from eudora, ks toward bonner springs

content.detailedDescription:
Out camping about 12 miles south of ehrenbarg, az. about 2 and 1/2 east of the river. there was a flash so bright. about 20 yrs. out, there it was just siting off the ground about five feet. about 10 minets passed, then an even brighter light came from it.
out of the light a man like shape walked out ,turned  and the ship left, as i watched the man like shape walked away in to the desert and north toward the town, so i followed, the next thing it became a child and was taken to many places all over the u.S. i followed them to for all, these years not ageing as we do but much slower, i sence as he/she as you'd learn it can change as it needes. but it's not at all as any one would think, but the one thing our goverment has learned there is nothing in our world that can, or has killed it, and they like me has been moving about as it does. now it's back in this area. why i hope to learn before i get any older. not sure why i followed like i was drorn to do that, who the people where that placed him in their auto, or what drown them to do sonot sure but one thing is sure the upper people in this country is some of the home he was taken to then to a family up north where they keeped it. as an adoped child.  now here it is 2009 and for the most part it lookes to be 30 in age, there are timesit apears to be 14 in age. 
and male, or female but to tell why it does it is something someone would need to see to understand, it stays to it's self for the most part.
even in a group of people only i and the goverment agents here know how to pick it out... 
 one thing it's best left alone, and i've seen the heading off from the goverment, and some reasons for it ooh they put it through the army at that time i was able to follow but there where no wars nam can to an end shortly before he left for boot camp, and not until he was out that an out brake started in 1982, i know what i know, i've not had much alife since that night but have been happy 90 % of the time!
content.summary: It landed, and someone, or thing walked out.

content.detailedDescription:
About 4-5am, from the deck of my home i saw the following event.  i get up most clear mornings and go out to observe the sky.  some times with binoculars and sometime with out.

while observing the orion nebula i saw a fast moving light moving from below the orion constellation in an upward direction.  another light of about the same brightness came in at about a 30 degree angle and seemed to join the first.  there was no flash of an explosion and the lights became one.  i thought one pass the other but this did not happen.  when the lights reached each other one disappeared and the other continued until it faded out.

i have seen the space station and other satellites but they never moved in the trajectory these two objects did.  we live below a major air coridor with many aircraft passing over each night (and day).

i can not even guess at the altitude.  the magnitude (brightness) was about the same as the average star around the orion constellation. 

this was a naked eye observation.
content.summary: Two star like lights converg and seem to become one.

content.detailedDescription:
i was working at the  church trimming a hill side.
 i was in a lighted area, 
while i was trimming there was something blocked the light behind me.
   when i turned scared,  there would be nothing there, then i went  
back to work trimming, then it happens again there was nothing there.
 when i turn around so i went back trimming again 
 after i finish i walk back to my truck.
i put my trimmer in the back of my truck.
then i open my truck door and got my hd camera.
i set my camera on low light setting then i started taking pictures.
 i was testing my camera out it was a new camera 
then i notice a light in a distance so i took a picture of it. 
ufo pictures are hard to get most of the time i never have a camera with me
 when i had a ufo sighting.
then i went back and got into my truck and went home.
after i got home.
 i was in my living room my wife was setting on the love seat she yelling  at my son he was in the other room.
i was standing in the living room.
there was a small red light appeared inside of my house inside of my picture window in between the curtains.
   it got real bright,   then it disappeared while i was looking at the light, then i told my wife to stop yelling at jimmy.
 then i told my wife there was a red light appeared behind her  while she was setting on the love seat.
the next morning i was up watching tv in the living room.
i was seating on the floor in front of the tv it was daylight outside.
i turn and looked at my curio cabinet as soon as i turn and looked at the cabinet the lights inside of the cabinet came on by itself i don't know why it came on, but it did.
 i got up and cut the lights off. 
i am sending two pictures the two pictures is the same picture but one of them is crop so you can see the ufo better
content.summary: I was working at a church i got a picture of a ufo while i was at the church

content.detailedDescription: After a long day at work my girlfriend and i sat outside in our chairs drinking a glass of wine. i looked up and saw a very fast moving light and thought it was a satellite move in irregular patterns and appeared to disappear into space. i thought it was a fluke until we saw another one flying from north to south-west. i called my friend that lives down the street and he came over. during this time we saw a few more. at 8:45 he arrived and we told him what he saw. we continued to look at the sky and talk. an hour went by without seeing anything until my girlfriend spotted a white ball like object that was beneath the clouds and it looked big, the size of quarter at arms length. the object flew from west to east and again appeared to fly out to space. the last event was about 20 seconeds and flew really fast. that night it was full moon with scattered clouds. the sky wasn't really the best but good enough to clearly spot the fast moving balls of light. all of the lights were white, contained no blinking lights.
content.summary: 5 white balls, 1 huge one flying over phoenix

content.detailedDescription: Camp pendleton, san diego county, 8:15 p.M., october 5, 2009 - we were driving north on the san diego freeway (interstate 5) through camp pendleton when all of a sudden a bright red light caught my attention to the left out over the ocean, maybe about a mile or so ahead of our car.  it was so unusual i could not stop staring at it.  i did not know what it was and it did not appear to be like any aircraft such as a helicopter or plane of any sort.  it glowed very intensely and pulsated at a regular interval, maybe 1 or 2 seconds apart.  the intensity of the light was strong and constant.  the color was ruby-like or light reddish.  my instinct told me this was not any regular flying craft that i knew of.  the light was much too intense to be of any known aircraft lighting system and there were no other lights blinking or stationary on it as you would normally see on a plane or helicopter.  the object was stationary for several seconds and then began to move eastward toward the san onofre nuclear generation station which was on the beach side of the freeway as we travelled north.  as it approached the nuclear plant it disappeared and faded away and then i knew this was no regular or military aircraft.  as its light disappeared i intently kept watching to see if it would appear again and only a few seconds later it reappeared on the opposite side of the freeway across from the nuclear plant near the mountain ridge where it moved eastward for a few seconds and then disappeared behind the mountain ridge into the valley behind it.  its light appeared to fade as it moved right behind this edge of the mountain.  i'm  wondering if this object was flaunting itself as it could be clearly seen by anyone on the busy freeway, and then all of a sudden, it wanted to travel over the freeway unseen and then reappear on the other side in clear view.  now, here you have a military base and a nuclear generating station together where an unusual flying object is seen hovering and flying, could it be attracted to these for some reason?  also, when it reappeared, it was near the several high voltage power lines emanating from the nuclear power plant.  could it have been attracted to the large magnetic fields of these power lines running up the mountain or could these have disrupted it power source as it faded away?  i used to be a skeptic but i am a firm believer now.  this is the real deal.
content.summary: Intense pulsating ruby-colored orb appears, disappears, then reappears, then disappears
